subject: p19565388
History: Hip fracture, acute process. Pre-operative evaluation.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, there is no relevant change. Borderline size of the cardiac silhouette without evidence of pulmonary edema or pleural effusions. Small pericardial fat pad on the left. Known and healed left rib fracture. No evidence of pneumonia. Mild tortuosity of the thoracic aorta.
